name: Swarm of Quippers
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.Blood Frenzy: The swarm has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.
traits.Swarm: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny quipper. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
traits.Water Breathing: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

actions.Bites: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
